entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
